details.text: Member Date of Birth
ID Proof Generic
Nominee Name
Nominee Date of Birth
Education Qualification
[For Women] Are you pregnant?
[For Women] Have you undergone any of these tests like mammogram, ultrasound, pap smear etc.?
Any history of chest pain, heart attack, palpitations, and breathlessness on exertion or irregular heart beat?
Hypertension or high blood pressure/high cholesterol?
Taking medicines for hypertension and is under control
Taking medicines for high cholesterols and is under control
In case of uncontrolled BP or cholesterol, provide details
When was high blood pressure first diagnosed?
Why was high blood pressure measured at that particular Time? e.g. Routine Examination, due to symptoms, etc.
Do you know what your blood pressure readings were at of diagnosis? If Yes please give details.

Have you had on E.C.G, X-Ray, blood lipid test or other investigations If Yes, please give details including dates of investigations and results. If yes please add the details Date, Type of Investigation and Result

Please give details of your treatment. Include names of medications (eg. Moduretic, Nvidrex, Aldomet, inderal, Tenoretic, Tenormin, Trasicor etc), dosage and how often taken. Currently and In the Past
[Regarding the monitoring of your condition] a) Who is in charge of your follow up?
[Regarding the monitoring of your condition] b) How often do you attend for follow up?
[Regarding the monitoring of your condition] c) When was your last consultation? Please give details of Your blood pressure readings at that time, if known
Have any abnormalities (e.g. protein, blood) ever been found in your urine? If Yes. please give dates and full details
Do you smoke cigarettes or biddies? If Yes, state the number smoked per day.
Have you lost time off work due to hypertension condition If Yes, please give details including date and duration of time off work.
Please give my any additional information on your condition, which you feel will be helpful in processing the application.
High blood sugar/ Diabetes, thyroid disorder or any other endocrine disorders
Asthma, bronchitis, wheezing, tuberculosis, breathing difficulties or any other respiratory disorder?
Blood disorder like anemia, leukemia or any circulatory disorder?
Liver disorders like cirrhosis, hepatitis, jaundice, disorder of the stomach, colitis or indigestion?
Any physical or mental disability or any congenital disease?
Any form of cancer, tumour, cyst, or growth of any kind or enlarged lymph nodes?
Any diseases related to kidney such as Kidney failure, Kidney or Ureteric stones, blood or pus in urine or prostrate or gynecological disorder?
History of surgery of kidney/Ureteric stone, no complications now.
History of stone in kidney, surgery not done, flushed out or still there but no problem.
History of UTI (Urinary tract Infection), recovered.
History of Ovarian cyst, no complications now
Any other give details
Epilepsy, nervous disorder, multiple sclerosis, tremors, numbness, paralysis or psychiatric disorder?
Eye, ear, nose or throat disorder, (Except use of spectacles)?
Disorder of back, muscle, joints, bone, neck, deformity, amputation, arthritis or gout

In the last 5 years, have you had or been advised to have or in the next 30 days will you have an X-ray/ CT Scan / MRI / ECG / TMT / blood test or any other investigatory or diagnostic tests or any type of surgery?
Do you or your spouse has been tested positive or is under treatment for HIV / AIDS / Sexually transmitted diseases (e.g. syphilis, gonorrhea, etc.) ?

Are you receiving any treatment /medication or has in the past received any treatment or undergone surgery/hospitalized for any medical condition /disability? If yes, Reason for medication and name of medicine?
Have you been off work due to illness or for a continuous period of more than 10 days during the last one year?
Have you suffered or suffering from any other disease/ailment/habit not mentioned above?
Do you intend to travel outside India within next 3 months ?
Height (in cm)
Weight (in kgs)
Habits & Addictions : Cig/beedi/cigar ; Gutka/Snuff/Paan ; Beer/Wine/Hard Liquor ; Any Drugs.
Are you Smoking currently or even occasionally in the last 2 year?
Please specify the number of cigarettes per day
Chewing Tobacco currently or even occasionally in the last 2 year?
Please specify the number of sachets per day
Alcohol (Beer/Wine/Hard Liquor)
Please specify the per day quantity
Are you taking drugs like cannabis/Marijuana,Ecstacy,Heroin,LSD,Amphetamines or any other illegal drugs?
Details if any
